title: Golden Krust Patties Recalls Beef and Chicken Products Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, April 29, 2015 Golden Krust Patties, a Bronx, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 9,073,384 pounds of beef and chicken products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contain egg, a...
